actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to amend the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation Act of 1972 to authorize appropriations and further borrowings for implementation of the development plan for Pennsylvania Avenue between the Capitol and the White House, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation Act of 1972 to increase the borrowing power of the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation. Authorizes appropriations for operating and administrative expenses of the Corporation through FY 1988.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation Act of 1972 to authorize appropriations and further borrowings for implementation of the development plan for Pennsylvania Avenue between the Capitol and the White House, and for other purposes.
